[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Function(
        Function {
            comments: CommentGroup {
                comments: [],
            },
            attributes: [],
            function: Span(
                3,
                1,
            ),
            ampersand: None,
            name: SimpleIdentifier {
                span: Span(
                    3,
                    10,
                ),
                value: "foo",
            },
            parameters: FunctionParameterList {
                comments: CommentGroup {
                    comments: [],
                },
                left_parenthesis: Span(
                    3,
                    13,
                ),
                parameters: CommaSeparated {
                    inner: [
                        FunctionParameter {
                            comments: CommentGroup {
                                comments: [
                                    Comment {
                                        span: Span(
                                            5,
                                            1,
                                        ),
                                        format: HashMark,
                                        content: "#if __PHP__",
                                    },
                                    Comment {
                                        span: Span(
                                            7,
                                            1,
                                        ),
                                        format: HashMark,
                                        content: "#endif",
                                    },
                                ],
                            },
                            name: SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    8,
                                    1,
                                ),
                                name: "$bodies",
                            },
                            attributes: [],
                            data_type: Some(
                                Array(
                                    Span(
                                        4,
                                        1,
                                    ),
                                ),
                            ),
                            ellipsis: None,
                            default: None,
                            ampersand: Some(
                                Span(
                                    8,
                                    1,
                                ),
                            ),
                        },
                    ],
                    commas: [],
                },
                right_parenthesis: Span(
                    9,
                    1,
                ),
            },
            return_type: None,
            body: FunctionBody {
                comments: CommentGroup {
                    comments: [],
                },
                left_brace: Span(
                    10,
                    1,
                ),
                statements: [],
                right_brace: Span(
                    11,
                    1,
                ),
            },
        },
    ),
]
